byline.contributor: Saw Nang contributed reporting from Mandalay, Myanmar.

headline.print_headline: Former U.N. Chief Voices Concern in Myanmar on Rohingya
headline.main: Kofi Annan, in Myanmar, Voices Concern Over Reported Abuses of Rohingya

snippet: Mr. Annan, the former head of the United Nations who leads a commission that was formed to study conditions in restive Rakhine State, urged security services to follow the “rule of law.”...
lead_paragraph: Mr. Annan, the former head of the United Nations who leads a commission that was formed to study conditions in restive Rakhine State, urged security services to follow the “rule of law.”
